sections.markdown:
Following the easing of a national lockdown in England, our interactive chart allows you to compare population statistics between local authorities. 

Select a local authority to see how it compares with other areas for each indicator. Indicators include:

- population (age, density and schoolchildren)
- age groups
- ethnicity
- employment
- industry
- those in key worker occupations 
- deprivation.

Highlight local authorities in a region with the filter in order to see how the indicators vary within regions.

<ons-interactive url="/visualisations/dvc1071/profiles/index.html" full-width="false" title="Population profiles"/>

[Download the data][1]

####Notes

1. Indicators relate to local authorities effective as at 1 April 2020 where available.
2. Indicators contain statistics from the latest available or most appropriate data sources at the time of publication.


  [1]: https://www.ons.gov.uk/visualisations/dvc1071/profiles/datadownload.xlsx
